attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what plans Donald Trump has for America and i am disgusted! His plans are horrible and will destroy America! He’s a liar and a horrible person! This app is trash and i don’t need it anymore! Apple needs to delete this app right now! It is a disgrace to America!
attributes.title: 🤢 disgusting 🙄

attributes.review: This app took hours to download and once it finally did I kept receiving weird messages from a tall version of the lorax who instead of wanting to save the world is trying to destroy it and promote white supremacy
attributes.title: Worst app of all time

attributes.review:
Our president is so hand fed he would much rather ban an APP because he’s too petty to face not even is going to agree with his opinions. He’s an ugly racist, sexist, white supremacists. Disgusting, and the fact that some of you guys defend this man so heavily truly terrifies me. 
Make America Vote Donald Trump Out
attributes.title: Our amazing president

attributes.review: When I installed this app I had very high hopes however through use I have discovered that this app is frankly disappointing. It crashes before I even get into it justifying my rating.
attributes.title: Was optimistic but disappointed

attributes.review: Hey girlys and guys this app is absolutely awful!! It took me three tries to download it and when I got it it keep shutting me out of the screen. I was also expecting at papi trump fan page🥳🤪✨🧚‍♀️all I got was NEWS🤬🤬anyways luvs this took all my info and sold it to China not TikTok.
attributes.title: Oranges🚫

attributes.review: U know I was trynna spy a little bit but I did not know what I was gonna get my self into 🤢 Bih I saw the flying turtles and gargoyles in my screen and that was so disrespectful bc My mom is a gargoyle and we don’t play them games 😔 So please respect my Harry Potter family  or u will get jumped by my husband sherk 🤪
attributes.title: Um no❤️

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it took forever to download and when I finally was able to open it up I noticed my attitude and mood started to  change into a “Ken” so I swiftly deleted it before it was to late...
attributes.title: Worst app ever!

attributes.review: Not sure why every time I open the app my phone shuts off. Like it doesn’t power off, but I have to click the button to open my phone up again.
attributes.title: Phone crash

attributes.review: This app needs a complete remake since it has no function if I can’t navigate around it, it’s literally so bad the app will make you exit every 30 seconds or so of using it. hehe I come from that tock tick
attributes.title: complete useless garbage

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it wasn’t helpful at all. It was very slow and not effective. I understand why it has such a low rating and I feel that it should be removed permanently.
attributes.title: Very disappointed
